patthana8.58:1.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana8.58:2.1: Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.58:3.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana8.58:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
